name: Justin Luk
title: PM / Indie Hacker
archetypeDescription: Has 47 side projects, 3 users (all his mom), and calls himself a 'founder'

moves.name: Scope Creep Strike
moves.effect: Adds 'just one more thing' to any project

flavor: Spends more time setting up the perfect dev environment than actually building products. The README is always immaculate though.
bangerQuote: Built a roast app instead of doing his actual job. Honestly, respect.
naturalRival: That guy who shipped the same idea but with VC funding
roastBullets: Portfolio website lists 12 projects, 11 are 'currently in stealth mode' (abandoned)
Bio says 'building in public' but the public is just his Twitter followers who are also building in public
The Venn diagram of 'things Justin has shipped' and 'things with users' is two separate circles
Created PM Roast to roast others, didn't realize the algorithm would roast him back
